artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Iseya Tatsugorō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; head and torso of woman wearing purple floral kimono and green and white obi; arranging her hair and looking in a small black and yellow mirror
inscription: LL: 大正十四年五月作 {Taishō jūyonen gogatsu saku}; BC: 双作版画會　伊せ辰 {Sōsaku hangakai Isetatsu}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Intermission
